TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit IssuerNameRegistryElement extends System.IdentityModel.Configuration.ConfigurationElementInterceptor

Docs.summary: Represents an element in a configuration file. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The `<issuerNameRegistry>` element configures the issuer name registry. The issuer name registry maps issuer tokens to a string name. The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IssuerNameRegistryElement.Type%2A> property (which represents the `type` attribute of the element) can be set to register a custom type. By default, a type of <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry> is assumed.
The `<issuerNameRegistry>` element can be specified at the service level under the `<identityConfiguration>` element or on a security token handler collection under the `<securityTokenHandlerConfiguration>` element. The `IssuerNameRegistry` property of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfigurationElement> class and of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenHandlerConfigurationElement> class is an instance of <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IssuerNameRegistryElement>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets or sets a string representation of the of the issuer name registry.
Docs.value: The string representation of the of the issuer name registry. The type must derive from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property is optional. It corresponds to the `type` attribute of the `<issuerNameRegistry>` element. If it is not specified, the property is `null`, a type of <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry> is assumed.
